name: Summer Top
description:
## Summer Top

Keep cool and comfortable during the hot summer months with this cute and stylish summer top that's perfect for any occasion.

### Bumpkins.io

Go to bumpkins.io to equip this collectible to your Bumpkin NFT

### About

Bumpkins is a community driven customisable NFT project powered by Sunflower Land
